short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With SearchToDo, you can create and edit your own to-do lists, with our simple and beautiful customized new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "SearchToDo": Your ultimate personal notepad and organizational powerhouse for Chrome, designed to elevate your productivity and goal-setting endeavors.

With "SearchToDo," you can effortlessly jot down your thoughts and ideas, secure in the knowledge that they will be preserved even when you close your browser. Our intuitive interface boasts a spacious text canvas, empowering you to capture, revise, or delete your notes at your convenience. Elevate your digital notetaking experience with "SearchToDo."

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the "SearchTodo" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use. The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy Policy: https://anysol-providers.com/Privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://anysol-providers.com/Terms-of-use/

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
